get.description: Lists available operations for the Kusto sub-resources inside Microsoft.Synapse provider.

200.description: The operation was successful. The response contains the list of available operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists eligible SKUs for Kusto Pool resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Checks that the kusto pool name is valid and is not already in use.

parameters.name: kustoPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the cluster.

200.description: OK -- Operation to check the kusto resource name availability was successful.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: List of Kusto pools under the Workspace.

put.description: Create or update a Kusto pool.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The Kusto pool parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate operation.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The ETag of the Kusto Pool. Omit this value to always overwrite the current Kusto Pool. Specify the last-seen ETag value to prevent accidentally overwriting concurrent changes.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: Set to '*' to allow a new Kusto Pool to be created, but to prevent updating an existing Kusto Pool. Other values will result in a 412 Pre-condition Failed response.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The Kusto pool parameters supplied to the Update operation.

parameters.description: The ETag of the Kusto Pool. Omit this value to always overwrite the current Kusto Pool. Specify the last-seen ETag value to prevent accidentally overwriting concurrent changes.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

204.description: NoContent -- Kusto Pool does not exist in the subscription.

OperationListResult.title: Result of the request to list REST API operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

value.title: The list of operations supported by the resource provider.

nextLink.title: The URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

display.title: The object that describes the operation.

provider.title: Friendly name of the resource provider.

resource.title: The resource type on which the operation is performed.

description.title: The friendly name of the operation.

origin.title: The intended executor of the operation.

KustoPoolListResult.description: The list Kusto pools operation response.

locations.description: The set of locations that the SKU is available

restrictions.description: The restrictions because of which SKU cannot be used

location.description: The available location of the SKU.

zones.description: The available zone of the SKU.

capacity.description: The number of instances of the cluster.

default.description: The default capacity that would be used.
